name: The Facility (itch) (Jordan)
description:
A Level Blockout for the first 5-7 minute segment of a 60's spy-themed first-person stealth game. This is proof of concept - stealth mechanics are largely absent, but it does allow you to visualise the final level.

Story:
You are an Agent for the British Secret Intelligence Service, tasked with covertly infiltrating the facility of a shady organisation based on a tropical island. After a rough undersea dispatch, you are about to arrive on a remote beach to the south of the island. (See the note in the screenshots for a fuller picture!)

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Look Around: Mouse Movement
Crouch / Stand Up: Left Shift

Note:
This demo currently has no means of pausing or escaping outside of ALT + F4 (despite what any in-game text may claim!).

If you stumbled across this and gave it a go, thank you! All feedback is welcome.
